title: I Changed Client/Ingame to Korean Font but Runes and Masteries sects are not updating to Korean Font

embed.description: This album is really big! It's going to take us a bit to get your download ready for you. Enter your email and we will notify you when it's ready. Once ready, it will be available for up to 24 hours.

body: I Changed Client/Ingame to Korean Font but Runes and Masteries sects are not updating to Korean Font

replies.body: This language isn't supported on NA and a few other regions.  We're unable to assist with game file modifications, and doing so is at your own risk.  This is because it could potentially corrupt your client or crash your game.  I could only advise restoring your client to the [supported language](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language).

Is there any support going forward for selecting different languages for the game while being in a different region. This has been requested since Season 2 at the least and should be able to be done with the new client. There is no conceivable reason it should not be implementable with the new client coming up as it is a completely re-coded client, Unless the programmers of the client are hard locking it into one language/region information. 

Since you are only part of player support please get this over to the Client developers, thank you.
